key_features_delivered: Role-aware navigation — each role sees only their tools
Demo mode with Nicole Calpin persona
5 GCP-specific validation rules (product integrity, warranty boundary, territory compliance, data isolation, CAD standards)
Audit logging on every kernel decision
architecture_decisions: Follows TradeOS proven pattern: kernel → boundaries → shell → auth
LDS Streaming Architecture: User Action → L1 Check → Load Entity → Render
Stateless shell — intelligence lives in entities, not in shell
White-label via config entity swap, not code changes
